sourcesContent:
//react imports
import React, {useEffect} from 'react'
import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import axios from '../apis/axios'
import { useGlobalContext } from '../globalContext'
import { FaStar } from 'react-icons/fa'

//bootstrap imports
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'
import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'

const ReviewRestaurantForm = () => {
    const {id} = useParams()

    const {
        reviewerName, setReviewerName,        
        reviewerText, setReviewerText,
        reviewerRating, setReviewerRating
    } = useGlobalContext()

    useEffect(() => {
      setReviewerName('')
      setReviewerText('')
      setReviewerRating('Rating')
  }, [])

    const handleReview = async event => {
        event.preventDefault()
        try {
            await axios.post(`/${id}/addReview`, {
                name: reviewerName,
                review: reviewerText,
                rating: reviewerRating
            })

            setReviewerName('')
            setReviewerText('')
            setReviewerRating('Rating')
            window.location.reload(true);
        } catch (error) {
            console.log(error)
        }
    }   

    //rendering component
    return (
            <Form className='d-flex flex-column gap-4 mt-4'>
                <Row>
                    <Col xs={9}>
                        <Form.Group className="mx-1" controlId="reviwerNameForm">
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                placeholder="Type your name"
                                value={reviewerName}
                                onChange={event => setReviewerName(event.target.value)}    
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                    </Col>

                    <Col xs={3}>
                        <Form.Group className="mx-1" controlId="ratingForm">
                            <Form.Select
                                aria-label="ratingSelect"
                                className='text-muted text-truncate'
                                value={reviewerRating}
                                onChange={event => setReviewerRating(event.target.value)}    
                            >
                                <option>Rating</option>
                                <option value="1">1</option>
                                <option value="2">2</option>
                                <option value="3">3</option>
                                <option value="4">4</option>
                                <option value="5">5</option>
                            </Form.Select>
                        </Form.Group>
                    </Col>
                </Row>

            <Form.Group className="mx-1" controlId="reviewTextForm">
                <Form.Control
                    as="textarea" rows={4}
                    style={{resize: "none"}}
                    className='resize-none'
                    type="text"
                    placeholder="Type your review..."
                    value={reviewerText}
                    onChange={event => setReviewerText(event.target.value)}
                />
            </Form.Group>
            
            <Row>
                <Col className='text-start'>
                    <Button className='px-4 ms-1' variant="primary" type='submit' onClick={event => handleReview(event)}>
                        Submit Review
                    </Button>
                </Col>

                <Col className='text-end'>
                    <Button className='px-4 me-1' variant="primary"> 
                        <Link to={`/`} className='text-white text-decoration-none'>
                            Back Home 
                        </Link>
                    </Button>
                </Col>
            </Row>       
        </Form>
    )
}

export default ReviewRestaurantForm
